page.title: 12GOWY VALLEY CLUBS, EVENTS
page.content: {CLUBS}Mother & Toddler group,Brownies Guides,Rangers,Cubs,Scouts,National Housewives Register,Womens Institute, Conservative Association,Horticultural Society,Evergreen (60+),Table Tennis, Cricket Club,Tree Society,Foothpaths Association,Twinning Ass.(Barrow twinned with Rubignon,France),British Legion,Football Club,Fishing Club, Youth Clubs senior & junior. {CHARITY}Guilden Sutton Community Assoc.formed to support the community, fund & build the village hall. {ENTERTAINMENT}Amateur dramatics-Young Players & Players,Guilden Sutton singers,Maypole dancers. {EVENTS ANNUAL}Sutton Six fun run. Fetes-Methodist,Anglican,village and School Christmas Fairs.Horticultural, Bulb & Rose Shows.Seasonal dancers. {ARTS & CRAFTS}Art Classes,craft circle.
